duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a diverse leadership and sales team, inspiring and motivating them to drive sales and provide an excellent client experience.
Align the entire team with driving sales, building strong talent, and ensuring the store operates efficiently and effectively.
Provide input on merchandising, marketing, and client relationship strategies.
Shape and execute store strategies to build trusting relationships with clients and associates, and to drive revenue.
Manage the end-to-end operations of the store and its team, including labor and supply budget.
